summary:
We haven’t spoke since you went away 
Comfortable silence is so overrated 
Why won’t you ever say what you want to say? 
Even my...
text:
We haven’t spoke since you went away
Comfortable silence is so overrated
Why won’t you ever say what you want to say?
Even my phone misses your call
source: From The Dining Table - Harry Styles

body:
GUYS I MISS HARRY ))):

it’s been 4 weeks and 1 day since I last saw my frog prince and I miss him so damn much, is it normal to still be having PCD this far out?? idk.. im sad… goodnight.

title: Roommates With A Prince
body:
Tessa is a young woman who goes to school at chrestmont academy with a roommate that doesnt care about what people think of him. But she thinks he is a jerk and a big one at that she doesn’t know he is a prince she only thought he was rich that was until he did something that made her fall inlove wi

“The Fuck ?” Harry spoke when he spotted someone in the room with them and Hillary stopped what she was doing. “Hi my names Tessa I’m actually looking for Harry Styles” Tessa spoke blush…

summary: "You can't not believe in destiny." He sits up using his elbow to support his upper body,green eyes staring into mine with...
body:
Sunsets and tears

“You can’t not believe in destiny.” He sits up using his elbow to support his upper body,green eyes staring into mine with disbelief. He looks so gorgeous in that moment that I almost think of dropping the subject altogether. The sunset is casting its glow on his face making him look more angelic that he already does.It’s tempting to give up,take back my words,anything to not ruin this peaceful moment with him.

“I don’t.” The words burn on my tongue like the rooftop we are sitting on burns my skin from absorbing all that sunlight during the day. “We are the immediate results of our actions.Every choice we make,bad or good,affects out future. All our mistakes determine who we become. Our good decisions too. It’s really comforting to think that everything happens for a reason, that everything we’re going through is set to happen the way it is, but it’s not true. There’s no greater purpose in this life, Harry. You make your own path. We’re suffering because of our mistakes but we’re the ones that made them in the first place. "I finally look up to meet his eyes.

His mouth has fallen open and he looks taken back from my words. A couple of minutes pass by before he talks. "But we’re here.We haven’t talked in almost a year and yet here we are. It can’t be random and it has nothing to do with the decisions we’ve made in the past. "He shuffles a little closer so our faces almost touch. The warmth radiating from his body is a feeling I had almost forgotten.

"Yes,it does.” I whisper desperately,shifting my gaze to the ground ,“If we hadn’t broken up we would-"a whimper escapes my mouth as I feel the all too familiar burning sensation in my eyes,"we wouldn’t be here. We would probably be at our home, watching the sunset from the large window in the living room,trying to decide how to spend our Friday night.” The memory unleashes a new set of emotions and my heart is aches,the same way it has for months now. “So there’s no destiny, just the results of every fucking decison we’ve made.”

I feel his hand cupping my jaw then,lifting my face so he can look me in the eyes,the contact sending chills down my spine. His eyes are red and brimming with tears,like mine.

“Don’t cry,please. I hate it when you do. Please baby,don’t.” His voice is shaky and as much I want to push him away and tell him that he has no right to ask me that when he’s the one causing it in the first place, I can’t.Instead, I close my eyes letting the tears fall freely. He immediately pulls me closer,bringing my head to rest on his shoulder as I sob and stain his white t-shirt with my tears.

It’s not long before Harry starts crying too. I feel his chest rising and falling rapidly as he gasps for air. His fingers press into my skin and I feel my heart breaking all over again. “Why do we have to be so broken,Harry?What did we do to deserve this?”

He mutters something incoherrent between sobs before taking a couple of deep breaths so he can talk again. “I don’t know,I’m sorry.But it hurts so bad, I can’t, I’m not-"his words are muffled by the way he pressed his head in my hair.

We stay like that for a few more minutes,but it could might as well be hours. Our breathing has calmed and the tears are dry on both of our cheeks. I take a look at Harry, his eyes are shut and he’s biting his lip,as if he’s trying to stop another wave of crying from taking over. He must have sensed me observing him and he slowly opens his eyes. He looks like a complete mess,but it brings me some sort of comfort,maybe because I feel the same way too.

"Maybe you were right,maybe it’s out fault that we ended up like this.” He confesses and I can only wrap my arms around him and squeeze him tight.

The sun has been long lost beyond the horizon, leaving only a tiny amount of light behind.The sky has turned deep blue and is filled with stars already.It’s a beautiful night in contrast with the infinite pain swirling around in my body and mind. Harry must have sensed that too, because he shifts underneath me so he can pull me closer and rub my back in comfort. And for the first time in months I feel something. Even though it’s small and barely there, I can’t ignore it.It’s like a spark lit in the deepest and darkest corner of my existence.

“Is this the end?” I find myself asking,because I need to know what does this all mean. Is this the closure we never got? The answer to all of my prayers asking for the pain to stop? The peace I’ve dreamt for? But how could it mean any of that if it is the end?

“It sure doesn’t feel like it."Harry presses a kiss to my forehead and the feeling is so new and familiar at the same time that I feel thousands of butterflies coursing through my body,"But we’ll be alright. That,I promise you.”

title: Cambridge (Part III)
body:

Gentleman

summary: The Flight That Changed My Life
title: The Flight That Changed My Life
body:
Jenni Williams needs inspiration, to find out what she wants to do with her life. Will an accidental run-in with newly formed pop band One Direction be just the push she needs to follow her dreams?

Chapter 9: Over the Pond

Harry’s POV:I’m stuck across the aisle from Louis, Jenn and Niall and I’m losing my mind. Ever since she nearly knocked me over in the airport I have been obsessed. But does she get seated next to me…

Read more…

blog.name: sweetcreatureishome
blog.title: Still together. Still going strong.
blog.description: Here to support both Louis and Harry as individual artists and as a couple.

summary: So Antis and Hets got pressed (what's new? Lol) about the Larry signs in the Santiago show. And started whining on Twitter about...
body:
So Antis and Hets got pressed (what’s new? Lol) about the Larry signs in the Santiago show. And started whining on Twitter about how Larry signs are disrespectful to Harry and just assumed that the signs made him uncomfortable.

The signs weren’t even nasty (unlike the disgusting het signs) or disrespectful. They were either tweets which still exist on both L and H Twitter accounts or tattoos which are literally inked on their bodies, and rainbow flags.

But like always, the antis tried to use it against the Larries and bash them for literally bringing signs to a concert (as if this is the first time somebody took signs to a show. Lol).

They claimed that Harry(or Louis) never acknowledged the signs (think twice). Some even went to the extent to say that Larries are “bullying” Harry’s kindness (like, what?). They’ll just go to any extent to push their “Harry hates Larries” narrative, regardless of whether they make sense or not.

First off, Harry himself says that in his shows people can be who they want to be, do what they want to do, and that he loves every single one of them. So I don’t think Harry would mind people choosing to believe in Larry or believe in love (as long as it’s not disrespectful) or bringing respectful Larry signs to his shows. It wasn’t as big a deal as the antis made it to be.

And as expected, during the show, Harry kept on saying how happy he was and how much he appreciates and loves each and everyone in the crowd.

However being the RBB that Harry is, he specifically mentioned the side stands with the rainbow lights and the signs (specifically the rose and dagger sign).

It does makes sense, Harry carefully wording that sentence to show his appreciation of whatever the fans bring or do. And as if that was not enough,

Bonus : He did see the rose-dagger sign and he even put his thumbs up towards the side where the sign was hung (because oBvIoUsLy hE wAs oFfEnDeD aNd uNcOmFoRtAbLe).

Here’s a video of Harry doing the thumbs up exactly towards where the sign is.

Thanks to Harry for being the darkest Larrie and debunking every Anti BS himself. ☕

So really, Antis should stop creating drama all the time and just leave Larries alone because it is quite clear that Harry doesn’t hate the Larries or that he is uncomfortable with them. He accepts everyone and loves each one of us equally.

Also, 28 minutes of silence to those who said that Harry never ever acknowledged Larry signs. Have a look..

Exhibit A :

I mean Harry was so uncomfortable that he had to acknowledge the sign twice.

Exhibit B :

Exhibit C : This was Harry and Louis'reaction when they saw freddieismyqueen’s rose and dagger sign during OTRA.

Look how uncomfortable they are. I mean, it’s not like they have the complementary rose and dagger tattooed on their skin, right? So how dare people bring signs about it?

So yeah, as long as it is not disrespectful, keep believing in whatever you want to believe, bring whatever signs you want to bring and be who you want to be. Harry and Louis loves every single one of us equally.

title: Something New
body:
Liam Payne AU

Part Four

Maxine’s perspective is slightly distorted as she opens her eyes to the bright lights of the morning. Her head buzzes with a nagging pain, reminding her of all the wine she drank the night before….

Read more…

summary: Looking for HS pit ticket in Chicago
body:
Looking for HS pit ticket in Chicago

I’m super nervous about standing on the floor by myself and I’m thinking pit would be better. It may be hopeless but does anyone want to point me in the right direction?? Pls pls
